title: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971: When performing the 'copy package' action in the package viewer, the copied package is present in the wrong destination. This issue is observed in the org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui module in jdt.ui.
OB: When the 'copy package' action is performed from the package viewer, the package 'ui' is copied into the destination project xx.
EB: The 'copy package' action should copy the selected package into the specified destination project without any errors.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Create a new project xxx. 2. Open the package viewer in project A. 3. Select a package. 4. From the context menu, choose the 'copy' option.
